item.title: Environment Design
item.description: Every object you encounter is vying for your attention Declutter and simplify your space to reduce distractions to facilitate Focus in support of achieving flow state
item.content:encoded:
Every object you encounter is vying for your attention

Declutter and simplify your space to reduce distractions to facilitate Focus in support of achieving flow state
